title: Ark CEO Wood on Buying 'Solution' Stocks
itunes:title: Ark CEO Wood on Buying 'Solution' Stocks
description:
Cathie Wood, CEO at Ark Investment, discusses buying additional shares of companies she owns during the coronavirus outbreak. She believes disruptive innovation will take root and gain significant market share.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
